DOC.brief_summary: This study clinical trial moderate sedation propofol versus moderate sedation ketamine procedural sedation Emergency Department .
DOC.brief_title: Propofol Versus Ketamine Moderate Procedural Sedation Emergency Department ( ED )
DOC.criteria: patient require moderate procedural sedation propofol ED age > 17 year pregnant intoxicate give informed consent allergy ketamine propofol patient require deep procedural sedation ASA physical status score > 2
